Articles.Content: After three, slightly less than planed, duna pass I finally got a scanner in polar orbit around Duna! It might have taken all but a few units of monopropellant to do it, but I did it just the same (half hour of RCS burn). As soon as I figure out how I'll post some pictures of the Scanning Rover/Pick-up truck I'm sending in what I think is a really cool landing pod/drop-ship.

Congratulations!

To post pictures, upload them to a photo sharing site (Imgur is commonly used here) and you can then use the insert image tool to place them in your posts.

Happy landings!
Thanks. So there's no way to load pictures directly in a post?
